alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 12:01PM CST until February 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTRY PRECIPITATION CONTINUING ACROSS THE AREA... .A low pressure system centered over northern Illinois at noon will track to Lake Huron by midnight. Snow and sleet generated by the system will continue early this afternoon, transitioning to all snow by evening. The heaviest snow will occur across north-central Wisconsin. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches, with the highest totals in the northwest part of the county. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions. Blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce the visibility at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, use extra caution. Take a flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
